This page provides information about the valid indicative distribution map for the ecosystem functional group [**T1.3 Tropical/Subtropical montane rainforests**](/efg-info/T1_3.qmd). For older or alternative maps, see [here](/altmap-info/T1_3_history.qmd).

## Methods

Here is the methods summary for **Map code and version**: T1.3.WM.nwx v1.0.

> The distribution of tropical montane rainforest was approximated from a model of environmental suitability based on climatic variables and cloud cover (Wilson and Jetz, 2016, Karger et al. 2021). Occurrences were aggregated to half degree spatial resolution and cells reclassified as major occurrences (>25% of cell area) and minor occurrences (< 25% of cell area).

## How to use the data

### Available files

:::{.aside}

Following maps are considered current and valid indicative distribution maps for this ecosystem functional group. `Web navigation` maps are optimised for use in webapps, but they have similar methods and differ only in details of format and processing. 

- Web navigation (**code: T1.3.web.alt**, version v2.1) 
 - Indicative Map (**code: T1.3.WM.nwx**, version v1.1) 


:::

You can download geospatial data for this map from the following sources:

**T1.3.web.alt** (v2.1): [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/T1.3.web.alt_v2.1.tif){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091125){target="gisdata"} :: [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.T1_3_web_alt){target="gisdata"} :: [GitHub repository](layers/T1.3.web.alt_v2.1_topo.json){target="gisdata"} :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/){target="gisdata"} :: [GitHub repository](T1.3.web.alt_v2.1_topo.json){target="gisdata"}

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.
